attributes.action: Allow immediate access to cannabis and cannabis extracts for medicinal purposes.
attributes.additional_details:
34 US states have some form of legal medical cannabis.Millons of sick people in the UK must use cannabis illegally.No regulations makes safety impossible to guarantee.
University of Toronto;Hebrew University, Jerusalem;Harvard Medical School;JAMA;The Lancet;OMMP;Raphael Mechoulam Ph.D(40+years peer reviewed research).  Sanjay Gupta;Rick Simpson;Lester Grinspoon;Rachna Patel. We are not going away.
attributes.background: Allow cannabis flower;extracts;medibles;suppositories;cultivation of 6 plants/18 seedlings/24 oz useable medicine per patient,no THC limit.Appoint licensed grower as caregiver,if needed.Caregiver may grow for 6 patients,plus himself.Waste products(low value leaf/stem/seed/root)exempt from regulation
